an3.141:1.1: “Tayo ca, bhikkhave, assaparasse desessami tayo ca purisaparasse.
an3.141:1.2: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
an3.141:1.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
an3.141:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco assaparasso javasampanno hoti; na vannasampanno na arohaparinahasampanno.
an3.141:2.3: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco assaparasso javasampanno hoti vannasampanno ca; na arohaparinahasampanno.
an3.141:2.4: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco assaparasso javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca.
an3.141:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco purisaparasso javasampanno hoti; na vannasampanno na arohaparinahasampanno.
an3.141:3.3: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco purisaparasso javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca; na arohaparinahasampanno.
an3.141:3.4: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco purisaparasso javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca.
an3.141:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, purisaparasso javasampanno hoti; na vannasampanno, na arohaparinahasampanno?
an3.141:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya opapatiko hoti tattha parinibbayi anavattidhammo tasma loka.
an3.141:4.4: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye panham puttho samsadeti, no vissajjeti.
an3.141:4.7: Idamassa na arohaparinahasmim vadami. Evam kho, bhikkhave, purisaparasso javasampanno hoti;
an3.141:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, purisaparasso javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca, na arohaparinahasampanno?
an3.141:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya opapatiko hoti tattha parinibbayi anavattidhammo tasma loka.
an3.141:5.4: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye panham puttho vissajjeti, no samsadeti.
an3.141:5.8: Evam kho, bhikkhave, purisaparasso javasampanno ca hoti; vannasampanno ca, na arohaparinahasampanno.
an3.141:6.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, purisaparasso javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca?
an3.141:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya opapatiko hoti tattha parinibbayi anavattidhammo tasma loka.
an3.141:6.4: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye panham puttho vissajjeti, no samsadeti.
an3.141:6.8: Evam kho, bhikkhave, purisaparasso javasampanno ca hoti vannasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca.
